name: Out Of Time (itch) (garretwied, Sarah Huseth)
description: Out of Time is a game based on a person experiencing different significant moments in their life. In each level the player is in a rush to get somewhere, and they must collect every object that is needed before completing the level. Time plays a very important role throughout the game, and the player must be strategic in how they manage their time while navigating each level.  If the player spends some of their limited time to explore  the level in depth, they may uncover hidden things that reveal more about the back story.
